name: Generate Bill and A/R Statements
description: Triggers generation of patient bills and accounts receivable statements for outstanding balances
hl7Reference: HL7 v2.3 Chapter 6 Financial Management - HL7.eu/HL7v2x/v23/std23
businessPurpose: Initiate generation of patient billing statements and accounts receivable reports for outstanding account balances
timing: Sent when billing cycle processing requires statement generation or on-demand bill creation
standardNotes: P04 triggers billing statement generation, not the actual bill content
Used for periodic billing cycles and ad-hoc statement requests
EVN.2 should contain the statement generation date/time
Generated statements typically sent through separate delivery channels
realWorldScenarios: Monthly billing cycle generates statements for all outstanding accounts
Patient requests current account statement before payment
Insurance follow-up requires updated statement for claim processing
Collection agency needs detailed statement for delinquent accounts
Financial counselor requests statement for payment plan setup
Audit department requires statement generation for account review

generationRules.PV1: Visit information if statement specific to encounter
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - statement accuracy affects patient satisfaction and payment collection
